channel.title: Fletching
channel.description:
I'm trying to make custom fletching in my server does anyone have an idea on what would go with this bit of code because I simply copied magic bow and it remains magic.
Like what the numbers indicate. First is new and second is magic what do i need to change to make it into a new bow. I just copied the color of the magic but I dont want it to have the same name when my players go to make it. [code]ARCTIC_BOW(10810, 946, new int[] { 72, 70 }, new int[] { 80, 85 }, new double[] { 83.25, 91.5 }, new Animation(6702)), [/code] [code]MAGIC_BOW(1513, 946, new int[] { 72, 70 }, new int[] { 80, 85 }, new double[] { 83.25, 91.5 }, new Animation(6702)),[/code]

item.title: Fletching
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

new int[] { 72, 70 },
Those are item IDs:

70 Magic longbow (u) 72 Magic shortbow (u)

So of course you’re going to be producing magic bows when you have the magic bows as the ids.

Read full topic

item.title: Fletching
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

Can you show me the constructor of your enum?

I’m trying to make custom fletching in my server does anyone have an idea on what would go with this bit of code because I simply copied magic bow and it remains magic.

Like what the numbers indicate.
